column1: eddie c. tharp| washington - eddie c. tharp
column4: passed away at 2:20 p. m. thursday
column7: at his home. he was born nov. 10
column11: to morris and edith (boyd) tharp. he married jan l. hirstein on june 22
column13: in morton. surviving are his wife of washington; his children
column28: justin tharp of peoria and adam tharp of washington; 45 grandchildren; three great-grandchildren; three brothers
column30: tony (kim) tharp of oklahoma and danny (sue) tharp of paducah
column32: maryland (jerry) woodell of georgia. he was preceded in death by his parents and one sister
column33: diane. he was a united states navy veteran. eddie worked at caterpillar inc. as a clerk
column34: retiring in 1998 after 31 years of service. he then owned and operated signs unlimited in washington. he was a member of freedom baptist church in bloomington. visitation will be from 4 to 8 p. m. monday
column37: at eastside bible church in morton. further visitation will be from 9 to 9:45 a. m. tuesday
column40: followed by a funeral service at 10 a. m.
column41: with pastor jason ogle officiating. burial will be in hillcrest memory gardens in morton. knapp-johnson funeral home and cremation center in morton is handling arrangements. memorials may be made to freedom baptist church
column44: il 61704. upcoming events. visitationjun 15. 4:00 pm - 8:00 pm eastside bible church1310 w. jefferson st. morton
